reviews.review_msg: In my experience he seemed to care very much about the material and the students succeeding.  The assignments and tests were HEAVY but never surprising and instructions were detailed to the point of it almost being too much at times.  He was super approachable and legitimately seemed to care about students succeeding.  Very fair grader IMO

In my experience, He doesn't seem to be empathetic or understanding, as the REM department in general. If you are recovering from any injury or disability, this professor most likely will not work with you. Way too rigid and difficult. Other departments, Professors, and Universities are more open and helpful. Integrity is keeping your word.
Great proffessor. Extremely knowledgeable and passionate about topics in class. Nothing but good things to say about Pascal.

Pascal is a fantastic professor. He cares deeply about his students, the class content, and his own work. REM 427 focuses on Avalanche Risk Management so it is beneficial to have some experience on the topic before hand. Pascal however, is one of the most respected figures in the industry so even without prior knowledge you are in a great position
